Name: Iron Lung
Benefits: Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron.

Name: Ironblood Surge
Benefits: You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact.

Name: Leave an Opening
Benefits: When you hit hard enough, you leave an opening so your ally can jump in on the action.

Name: Litany of Depravity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You undercut your enemy's vain moralism, opening their heart to evil.

Name: Litany of Righteousness
Benefits: You call upon righteousness to expose an evil foe’s weakness.

Name: Mountain Quake
Benefits: You stomp, shaking the earth beneath you and causing quakes.

Name: Murderer's Circle
Benefits: Circle your foe while you beat on them.

Name: Mysterious Repertoire
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your mystery holds unknowable depths of magic not always associated with the divine.

Name: Path of Iron
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them.

Name: Peculiar Anatomy
Benefits: Your circulatory system contains viscous protoplasmic fluid instead of ordinary blood.

Name: Perfect Finisher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You focus your panache into an impeccable assault.

Name: Pin to the Spot
Benefits: Strike a foe and restrain them.

Name: Pivot Strike
Source: Pathfinder #151
Benefits: You Leap and then Strike using your staff.

Name: Plot the Future
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You spend 10 minutes in contemplation to uncannily predict how events will play out.

Name: Prayer Attack
Benefits: You've mastered the signature assassination style of the Red Mantis.

Name: Premonition of Clarity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks.

Name: Preternatural Parry
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second.

Name: Reactive Transformation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Wild Shape; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
Benefits: You transform reflexively when in danger.

Name: Reflect Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You cause a spell to fire back at its caster.

Name: Resilient Shell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon is resilient against attacks.

Name: Rites of Transfiguration
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can adapt your patron's power to transform other creatures into forms more befitting their behavior or your whims.

Name: Seeker Arrow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your shots zip around corners and fly at impossible angles to reach your target.

Name: Sense the Unseen
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When you look for foes, you can catch even the slightest cues.

Name: Shadow Power
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can focus the shadows into a powerful blast.

Name: Shadow's Web
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You launch a wave of shadowy ki outward from your body, damaging your opponents and potentially binding them in place.

Name: Shape of the Dragon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've discovered how to transform yourself into a dragon.

Name: Share Eidolon Magic
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon shares innate spells with you.

Name: Shared Prey
Benefits: Hunting as a duo, you and your ally both single out your prey.

Name: Shift Spell
Benefits: You move an active spell's area to a new location.

Name: Shifting Terrain
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Rough Terrain Stance; master in Nature
Benefits: You slam your fist into the ground or twirl your arms about to cause the terrain around you to shift and ripple, potentially throwing others off balance.

Name: Signature Synergy
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies.

Name: Soothing Ballad
Benefits: You soothe your allies’ wounds with the power of your performance.

Name: Sow Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You fold your spell into a seed.

Name: Specialized Beastmaster Companion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your nimble and savage animal companions become cunning enough to become specialized.

Name: Specialized Companion (Druid)
Benefits: Your animal companion continues to grow in power and ability, and it is now cunning enough to become specialized.

Name: Specialized Mount
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind.

Name: Speedy Rituals
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can perform rituals in only a fraction of the usual time.

Name: Spell Shroud
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your spell shrouds you in a billowing cloud.

Name: Spellmaster's Tenacity
Benefits: You call upon the power of your spells to protect you from the worst of the magic headed your way.

Name: Spell-Repelling Form
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon evolves to protect itself from the danger posed by spells.

Name: Stance Savant (Fighter)
Benefits: When there’s imminent danger, you drop into a stance with a mere thought.

Name: Stay Down!
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have ways of keeping your foes down.

Name: Stealthy Companion
Benefits: You’ve trained your animal companion to blend in to its surroundings.

Name: Stone Communion
Benefits: You can speak Terran and speak with stones.

Name: Strategic Bypass
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your plans account for your foes' resistances, enabling you to strike a telling blow.

Name: Sunder Enchantment
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can focus your superstition to break the magic of an item, in addition to destroying freestanding spells and those active on creatures.

Name: Superior Bond
Benefits: When you draw upon your bonded item, you can leave a bit of energy within it for later use.

Name: Swift Banishment
Benefits: The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane.

Name: Tactical Cadence
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your remarkable breath control and concise instructions allow you to coordinate your allies more effectively.

Name: Talismanic Sage
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have forgotten more about talismans than lesser warriors have ever known.

Name: Tangled Forest Rake
Benefits: You reposition foes with raking attacks.

Name: Target of Opportunity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You capitalize on your ally's attack to create a coordinated barrage.

Name: Targeting Shot
Benefits: You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses.

Name: Terrain Shield
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You're so attuned to the land that it rises up to protect you from a potentially fatal blow in a seeming coincidence.

Name: Timeless Body
Benefits: You cease aging.

Name: Timeless Nature
Benefits: With primal magic sustaining you, you cease aging.

Name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
Benefits: You have transcended the barriers between words and meaning.

Name: Touch Focus
Benefits: You can redirect a spell's power through you to deliver it within striking distance.

Name: Triumphant Inspiration
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With a triumphant shout, you inspire your allies.

Name: True Debilitating Bomb
Benefits: Ever inventive, you have discovered increasingly devastating ways for your bombs to impede and hamper your foes.

Name: True Hypercognition
Benefits: Your mind works at an incredible pace.

Name: Twinned Defense (Swashbuckler)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You're always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

Name: Two-Weapon Flurry
Benefits: You lash out with both your weapons in a sudden frenzy.

Name: Unending Emptiness
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You pool the power of shadow within your eyes, gaining the ability to gather darkness into a turbulent orb of crushing emptiness within your line of sight.

Name: Vengeful Strike
Benefits: When struck by an enemy, you respond in turn.

Name: Verdant Metamorphosis
Benefits: You transform into a plant version of yourself.

Name: Vigorous Inspiration
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You instill magical vigor in your allies when you inspire them to attack.

Name: Warden's Guidance
Benefits: You can convey your prey’s location to your allies, no matter how well hidden it is.

Name: Whirling Blade Stance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You enter a mindful stance that creates a deep connection between you and your monk weapons, allowing you to manipulate them with your ki even at a distance.

Name: Whirlwind Strike
Benefits: You attack all nearby adversaries.

Name: Wild Winds Gust
Benefits: You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind.

Name: Wind-Tossed Spell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover.

Name: Wyrmbane Aura
Benefits: Your aura protects against destructive energies and dragons’ breath.

Name: Cloud Jump
Benefits: Jump impossible distances.

Name: Craft Anything
Benefits: Ignore most requirements for crafting items.

Name: Divine Guidance
Benefits: Find guidance in the writings of your faith.

Name: Legendary Codebreaker
Benefits: Quickly Decipher Writing using Society.

Name: Legendary Guide
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Increase your party’s travel speed through wilderness terrain

Name: Legendary Linguist
Benefits: Create pidgin languages to communicate with anyone.

Name: Legendary Medic
Benefits: Remove disease or the blinded, deafened, doomed, or drained condition.

Name: Legendary Negotiation
Benefits: Quickly parley with foes.

Name: Legendary Performer
Benefits: Gain renown for your Performance Virtuosic Performer.

Name: Legendary Professional
Benefits: Gain renown for your Lore.

Name: Legendary Sneak
Benefits: Hide and Sneak without cover or being concealed.

Name: Legendary Survivalist
Benefits: Survive extreme conditions.

Name: Legendary Thief
Benefits: Steal what would normally be impossible to steal.

Name: Reveal Machinations
Benefits: You convince a creature that you played a minor but recurring role in its life.

Name: Scare to Death
Benefits: Scare a target so much, they might die.

Name: Unified Theory
Benefits: Use Arcana for checks for all magical traditions.

Name: Auspicious Mount
Benefits: Guided by your ongoing care, your steed has developed incredible intelligence and skill.

Name: Avalanche Strike
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You attack all nearby adversaries.

Name: Blank Slate
Benefits: Your deceptions confound even the most powerful mortal divinations.

Name: Chemical Contagion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With carefully engineered enzymes, you coax some of your poison to infect another target, using the original victim as a carrier.

Name: Cloud Step
Benefits: Using fantastic acrobatic skill, you can walk for brief stretches across insubstantial surfaces.

Name: Cognitive Loophole
Benefits: You can find a loophole in a mental effect to temporarily overcome it.

Name: Collateral Thrash
Benefits: When you Thrash a grabbed foe, you smack that foe into another nearby.

Name: Courageous Onslaught
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You use your performance to orchestrate an onslaught against your enemies.

Name: Cross the Threshold
Source: Pathfinder #166
Benefits: You can cast ethereal jaunt as an occult innate spell once per day.

Name: Deadly Grace
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your graceful attacks are especially powerful.

Name: Didactic Strike
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When you find a glaring weakness, you can set your allies up to annihilate your foe.

Name: Disciple's Breath
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Dragon Disciple Dedication; dragon breath sorcerer bloodline spell
Benefits: You unleash your breath weapon without spending focus.

Name: Dispelling Slice
Benefits: Your sneak attack slices through the threads binding magic to a target.

Name: Dispelling Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: The spell you deliver tries to force out magic affecting your enemy.

Name: Diverse Mystery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have broadened your understanding of the divine and can tap into the wonders of a different mystery.

Name: Dragon Transformation
Prerequisites: dragon instinct; Dragon's Rage Wings
Benefits: You transform into a ferocious large dragon.

Name: Effortless Concentration
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You can maintain a spell with hardly a thought.

Name: Electric Counter
Benefits: You can charge yourself with lighting, gain resistance to electricity or shocking an attacker.

Name: Enlightened Presence
Benefits: You exude an aura of resolve.

Name: Eternal Bane
Benefits: A life of evil has made you a nexus for your deity’s vile power.

Name: Eternal Blessing
Benefits: Your good deeds have brought your deity’s grace to you for all of eternity.

Name: Eternal Elixir
Benefits: Your body readily accepts and retains minor changes.

Name: Ever-Vigilant Senses
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon has enhanced senses.

Name: Expand Aura
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: You have at least one aura from a champion feat or feature.
Benefits: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.

Name: Exploitive Bomb
Benefits: You mix a substance into the bomb to foil resistances.

Name: Felicitous Riposte
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You take advantage of your foe's openings with uncanny odds.

Name: Flinging Blow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You take a moment to center yourself, then unleash a powerful blow that sends your target tumbling away.

Name: Focus Ally
Benefits: You're so focused on your allies that you can help them to recenter when something would take them out of the fight.

Name: Fulminating Synergy
Benefits: When you draw upon your spells’ synergy, you create a physical manifestation of their magical resonance and invoke it to harm a foe.

Name: Furious Vengeance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your enemy's blow fuels your rage and provokes your immediate retaliation.

Name: Genius Mutagen
Benefits: Specialized tweaks to your formula that supplements your genius considerably broaden the benefits you gain from cognitive mutagens.

Name: Graceful Poise
Benefits: With the right positioning, your off-hand weapon can strike like a scorpion’s stinger.

Name: Greater Distracting Shot
Benefits: Even a single missile can throw of your enemy’s balance, and more powerful attacks leave it flustered for longer.

Name: Greater Mental Evolution
Benefits: Your bloodline’s deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire.

Name: Greater Vital Evolution
Benefits: Vital power surges through you like a font of energy.

Name: Impaling Briars
Benefits: You can fill an area with devastating briars that impale and impede your foes.

Name: Implausible Purchase (Investigator)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: It seems impossible, but you've analyzed every angle and are able to just keep pulling out exactly the item you need, even in far-flung locations.

Name: Improved Reflexive Shield
Benefits: Your shield can help save nearby allies.

Name: Improved Twin Riposte (Ranger)
Benefits: You are able to riposte an additional time per turn.

Name: Instrument of Slaughter
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: divine ally (blade); tenets of evil
Benefits: Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes.

Name: Instrument of Zeal
Prerequisites: divine ally (blade); tenets of good
Benefits: Divine energy fills your weapon.

Name: Lead the Pack
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Mature Beastmaster Companion; you have multiple animal companions
Benefits: You can have up to two animal companions active at once.

Name: Legendary Monster Hunter
Prerequisites: Master Monster Hunter; legendary in Nature
Benefits: Your knowledge of monsters is so incredible that it reveals glaring flaws in your prey.

Name: Master of Many Styles
Benefits: You move between stances in an unceasing dance.

Name: Master's Counterspell
Prerequisites: Spellmaster Dedication; master in spell attack rolls and spell DCs
Benefits: When a foe Casts a Spell and you can see its manifestations, you can use your magic to disrupt it.

Name: Medusa's Wrath
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You learn a monstrous ki technique that infuses your blows with the petrifying power of a medusa's gaze.

Name: Mobile Magical Combat
Benefits: You dart around the battlefield, casting spells while you carefully make melee attacks with your weapon.

Name: Monstrosity Shape
Benefits: You can transform into a powerful magical creature.

Name: Multishot Stance
Benefits: You lock yourself in a stable position so you can fire swiftly and accurately.

Name: One-Millimeter Punch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your punches have incredible force and control.

Name: Opportune Throw
Source: Pathfinder #151
Benefits: Make a ranged attack with a Juggled item against a vulnerable creature.

Name: Overwhelming Blow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You throw your weight into a powerful attack that leaves you vulnerable.

Name: Penetrating Projectile
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your projectiles are unhindered by flesh and bone.

Name: Perfect Distraction
Benefits: You use clever tactics to mislead your foes as you sneak away. You Sneak while leaving a decoy behind.

Name: Performance Weapon Expert
Prerequisites: Provocator Dedication; expert in any kind of weapon or unarmed attack
Benefits: Your experience has made you better with a wide variety of weapons.

Name: Persistent Mutagen
Benefits: You’ve trained your physical form to remain stable within the a given altered state.

Name: Phase Arrow
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can concentrate an immense amount of magic to create a piece of ammunition that phases through everything but your target.

Name: Portentous Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your spellcasting is rife with strange lights, esoteric gestures, and other captivating effects that befuddle your foes.

Name: Quickened Attunement
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: If your next action is to cast a spell that would grant your terrain attunement bonus, reduce the number of actions to cast it by 1 (to a minimum of 1 action).

Name: Quivering Palm
Benefits: Your strikes can kill foes.

Name: Reckless Abandon
Benefits: Your blood boils when you take a beating, and you throw caution to the wind to finish the fight.

Name: Reconstruct the Scene
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You spend 1 minute surveying a small location (such as a single room) to get an impression of events that occurred there in the last day.

Name: Remediate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: harmful font or healing font
Benefits: If your next action is to use your divine font to cast a 3-action heal or harm spell to damage creatures, you can harness the residual energy to counterbalance opposing forces.

Name: Resounding Cascade
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: When you enter your Arcane Cascade, you disperse the magical reinforcement to nearby allies.

Name: Resounding Finale
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You bring your performance to a sudden, dramatic finish, drowning out other sounds.

Name: Resurrectionist
Benefits: You can cause a creature you bring back from the brink of death to thrive and continue healing.

Name: Resuscitate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can use Medicine to resuscitate the dead.

Name: Scintillating Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your spells become a radiant display of light and color.

Name: Shattering Blows
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease.

Name: Shattering Strike (Monk)
Benefits: The force of your considered blow shatters objects and defenses alike.

Name: Shield of Grace
Benefits: You protect an ally with both your shield and your body.

Name: Siphon Power
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You draw upon the reservoir of your patron's magic that resides within your familiar.

Name: Sixth Pillar Mastery
Benefits: Your greater discipline aligns your magical and physical potential.

Name: Song of Grace and Speed
Source: Pathfinder #170
Benefits: You instill great swiftness into your allies.

Name: Specialized Companion (Ranger)
Benefits: Your animal companion has become cunning enough to become specialized.

Name: Spell Tinker
Benefits: You’ve learned to alter choices you make when casting spells on yourself.

Name: Steal Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When you use Legendary Thief to steal the impossible, you can steal a prepared spell or spontaneous spell from a foe.

Name: Studious Capacity
Benefits: Your continued study of occult magic has increased your magical capacity.

Name: Stunning Appearance
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your sudden appearance leaves your foe unable to respond.

Name: Swift Elusion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Attempt an Acrobatics check against the foe's Reflex DC.

Name: Terraforming Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You capture transformative fragments of magic and slam them into the ground, creating a shock wave that alters your surroundings.

Name: Trample
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon Strides up to double its Speed and can move through the spaces of creatures at least one size smaller, Trampling each creature whose space it enters.

Name: Twinned Defense (Fighter)
Benefits: You’re always ready to use your off-hand weapon to interfere with attacks against you.

Name: Ubiquitous Snares
Benefits: You can prepare a seemingly impossible number of snares in advance, and you’re ready to spring them on unsuspecting foes.

Name: Ward Mind
Benefits: To protect the knowledge within your mind from intrusion or erasure, you ward yourself against a mental attack.

Name: Animal Shape
Benefits: You have full control over your shape and can transform into your inherent animal.

Name: Animal Swiftness
Benefits: You move like an animal.

Name: Azaersi's Roads
Benefits: Azaersi has granted you limited access to the Stone Roads, attuning you to the tiniest sliver of the Onyx Key.

Name: Blazing Aura
Benefits: You explode in flame.

Name: Bone Rider
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Using your ancestors' bones, you manifest their spirits around you in a fossilized form, terrifying your foes.

Name: Boneyard's Call
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have a powerful connection to the Boneyard and its courts, granting you the ability to travel to and from the Boneyard.

Name: Cantorian Restoration
Benefits: The energy that flows in your blood can save a life in the direst of times.

Name: Celestial Word
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can call forth a holy word from the celestial realms to punish your foes.

Name: Ceremony of Sun's Gift
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: Your connection to the sun has become an unbreakable bond.

Name: Channel the Godmind
Benefits: You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings.

Name: Crone's Cruelty
Benefits: Filled with rancor and hate, you rend the minds of those who displease you.

Name: Elude Trouble
Benefits: You slip through your foe's opening.

Name: Eternal Wings (Aasimar)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

Name: Eternal Wings (Sylph)
Benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your body.

Name: Favor of Heaven
Benefits: You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side.

Name: Fiendish Word
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can call forth a blasphemous word from the fiendish realms to punish your foes.

Name: Final Form
Benefits: You embrace your monstrous blood and make it your own, screaming out to the heavens and hells alike in rage, pain, and defiance.

Name: Flourish and Ruin
Benefits: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes.

Name: Fountain of Secrets
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: You constantly remember details about the world.

Name: Great Tengu Form
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You take on the imposing form of a large, winged oni.

Name: Heroic Presence
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The blood of heroes courses through your veins, and you inspire your allies to dig deep and find a new level of resolve.

Name: Hero's Wings
Benefits: You have begun the final steps to reaching your full potential.

Name: Homeward Bound
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The connection between you and the First World resonates within your body stronger than it does for most gnomes, allowing you to cross the threshold between the Material Plane and the First World.

Name: Hurricane Swing
Benefits: Choose either lightning bolt or gust of wind.

Name: Magic Rider
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your people used powerful magic to travel between distant worlds, and the remnants of that magic make such transportation easier for you.

Name: Olethros's Decree
Benefits: You have a connection to olethroses, the enigmatic psychopomps who successfully swayed the yamaraj to permit the creation of the first duskwalkers.

Name: Pierce the Light
Benefits: You tear the veil between the Material Plane and its shadow.

Name: Radiate Glory
Benefits: Your inherent glory radiates into the world with all the divine power of the celestial planes for 1 minute.

Name: Rallying Cry
Benefits: You call out to your allies and push them to give their all in combat.

Name: Rampaging Ferocity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You lash out viciously even as you fend off death.

Name: Rampaging Form
Prerequisites: Change Shape with a fox alternate form
Benefits: Once per day, when you Change Shape into a fox, you can instead gain the effects of both the canine form of 5th-level animal form and 7th-level fiery body for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.

Name: Ratfolk Growth
Benefits: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle.

Name: Reckless Abandon (Goblin)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Despite a lifetime filled with questionable decisions, you've managed to survive, as though you have uncanny luck that lets you avoid the consequences of your own actions.

Name: Regrowth
Benefits: Your command over your vital essence allows you or an ally to recover from grievous wounds.

Name: Relentless Wings
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your wings are now a permanent part of your physiology.

Name: Reliable Luck
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have gone well past nine lives to survive danger with surprising regularity.

Name: Scion Transformation
Benefits: You go into hibernation for 24 hours and perform a ritual dedicated to your ancestors, undergoing a one-time metamorphosis.

Name: Shadow Self
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: With a powerful talent for misdirection, you slip from your adversaries' notice so thoroughly you appear to be somewhere else.

Name: Soaring Form
Benefits: Your wings grow stronger.

Name: Stone Form
Benefits: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental.

Name: Stonegate
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Earthen barriers no longer impede your progress.

Name: Storm Form
Benefits: You can transform into an elemental.

Name: Stormy Heart
Benefits: The elemental power in your blood is a raging storm.

Name: Symphony of Blood
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You call forth the blood of your foes to grant you vigor.

Name: Ten Lives
Benefits: When your character would die, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check.

Name: Tidal Shield
Benefits: You conjure the force of the tides to gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Name: Trickster Tengu
Benefits: You can transform yourself or the bodies of others to express your displeasure.

Name: True Gaze
Source: The Mwangi Expanse
Benefits: When you focus your eyes carefully, your gaze can pierce through all obfuscations, even magical ones.

Name: Twist Healing
Prerequisites: ability to cast heal and harm
Benefits: Your connection to both life and undeath lets you twist the healing power of magic items to suit your own needs and aims.

Name: Underwater Volcano
Benefits: You can cast volcanic eruption as a 7th-level primal innate spell once per day.

Name: Wyrmling Flight
Benefits: Your draconic wings have grown large and strong enough for flight.

Name: Yamaraj's Grandeur
Benefits: You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all.

Name: All in my Head
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Using your occult connections and incredible powers of persuasion, you convince yourself that the triggering damage is a figment of your imagination.

Name: Arrow of Death
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You modify an arrow or bolt to bring death to your target in a single potent hit.

Name: Blaze of Revelation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your mind and body can, for a short time, withstand the devastation of overdrawing your curse.

Name: Bloodline Wellspring
Benefits: Your blood’s power replenishes your focus.

Name: Brutal Critical
Benefits: Your critical hits are particularly devastating.

Name: Celestial Form
Benefits: You take on a celestial countenance, appearing like a type of celestial who serves your deity.

Name: Conflux Wellspring
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You've achieved perfect magical and physical balance, allowing magic to flow into and through you more easily.

Name: Deep Lore
Benefits: Your repertoire is vast, containing far more spells than usual.

Name: Diamond Fists
Benefits: Your body hardens as you combine your attacks, making your finishing blows more damaging.

Name: Discordant Voice
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your inspire courage lets loose a discordant shriek that imbues your allies' attacks with powerful sonic reverberations.

Name: Divine Effusion
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The power of your mystery surges through you like a font of divine energy, even when your own magic dwindles.

Name: Domain Wellspring
Benefits: The intensity of your focus grows from the investment you’ve placed in your domains.

Name: Echoing Channel
Benefits: When you pull forth positive or negative energy, you also create a smaller pocket of that energy.

Name: Echoing Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You time the components of your spell with exacting precision, setting up a resonance that duplicates the spell's effects.

Name: Effortless Reach
Benefits: Focusing the powers of your ki to augment your blows, you stretch and lengthen your body in ways that defy logic.

Name: Empty Body
Benefits: You transmute your body into an ethereal form.

Name: Eternal Composition
Benefits: The world is a stage upon which you are always playing.

Name: Fiendish Form
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your features reshape into those of a type of fiend who serves your deity; for example, as a demon you might have putrid scales, twisted horns, and red eyes.

Name: Greater Crossblooded Evolution
Benefits: Your bloodline is extraordinarily complex.

Name: Halcyon Spellcasting Sage
Prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Adept; legendary in either Arcana or Nature, master in the other
Benefits: Your command over halcyon magic is nearly unmatched.

Name: Hex Wellspring
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Focus flows from your patron each time you commune with your familiar.

Name: Implausible Infiltration
Benefits: You find tiny holes or imperfections that no one else could see and try to somehow fit yourself through them.

Name: Implausible Purchase (Rogue)
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Even when impossible, you always have exactly what you need.

Name: Impossible Flurry
Benefits: You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed.

Name: Impossible Polymath
Prerequisites: Esoteric Polymath; trained in Arcana, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Your esoteric formulas are so unusual that they allow you to dabble in magic from diverse traditions.

Name: Impossible Volley
Benefits: You fire a volley at all foes in an area.

Name: Improbable Elixirs
Benefits: Your mastery of alchemical secrets enables you to replicate effects most believe can be achieved only via magic.

Name: Improved Swift Banishment
Benefits: You easily banish creatures with your weapon.

Name: Incredible Luck
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You always seem to bounce back from the worst.

Name: Infinite Possibilities
Benefits: You’ve found a way to prepare a spell slot that exists in your mind as many different possibilities at once.

Name: Invoke Disaster
Benefits: You can invoke nature’s fury upon your foes.

Name: Ki Center
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: ki spells; Master of Many Styles
Benefits: You center yourself with the universe and draw upon its vast power.

Name: Ki Form
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have mastered a potent technique for using your ki to reinforce your physical form and propel yourself through the air.

Name: Lead Investigator
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You spend 1 minute briefing up to four allies about one lead you're pursuing.

Name: Lethal Finisher
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You stab your foe in a vital organ, possibly killing them outright.

Name: Link Wellspring
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your bond replenishes your focus.

Name: Magical Master
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your eidolon gains a bevy of lower-level spells.

Name: Manifold Edge
Benefits: You’ve learned every possible edge to use against your foes.

Name: Master Bard Spellcasting
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for bard spellcasting.

Name: Master Cathartic Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Cleric Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Expert Cleric Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for cleric spellcasting.

Name: Master Druid Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Expert Druid Spellcasting; legendary in Nature
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for druid spellcasting.

Name: Master Eldritch Archer Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Magus Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Expert Magus Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana
Benefits: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Oracle Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Expert Oracle Spellcasting; legendary in Religion
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Scroll Cache
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your scroll collection is incredible, brimming with eldritch power, and you can prepare far more of them than an ordinary scroll trickster.

Name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion, depending on bloodline
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.

Name: Master Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting archetype benefits.

Name: Master Summoner Spellcasting
Source: Secrets of Magic
Prerequisites: Expert Summoner Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your eidolon's tradition
Benefits: You gain the master bounded spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Witch Spellcasting
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: Expert Witch Spellcasting; legendary in the skill associated with your patron's tradition
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits.

Name: Master Wizard Spellcasting
Prerequisites: Expert Wizard Spellcasting; legendary in Arcana
Benefits: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for wizard spellcasting.

Name: Masterful Companion
Benefits: Your animal companion shares your incredible hunting skills, allowing it to take down your shared prey with ease.

Name: Meditative Wellspring
Benefits: When you clear your mind, your focus comes flowing back in a powerful rush.

Name: Mighty Dragon Shape
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You've practiced and increased your draconic might, allowing you to take your draconic form more often.

Name: Mindblank Mutagen
Benefits: With a minor adjustment of ratios in the formula for your serene mutagen, you gain mental protections.

Name: Miracle Worker
Benefits: Your alchemical mastery can resuscitate the recently slain.

Name: Miraculous Possibility
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your deity empowers you to perform minor miracles, allowing you to readily adapt to the fluctuating needs of your duties.

Name: Parry and Riposte
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation.

Name: Perfect Clarity
Benefits: You burn out all of your rage to ensure that your attack lands and your mind remains free.

Name: Perfect Debilitation
Benefits: You have perfected the formulas for bombs that impede your enemies.

Name: Perfect Form Control
Benefits: Thanks to magic and muscle memory, you can stay in your alternate forms indefinitely.

Name: Perfect Shot
Benefits: After watching the motions of combat with incredible intensity and precision, you fire at your prey at the perfect moment to deliver maximum pain.

Name: Powerful Sneak
Benefits: You have learned to exploit your enemies’ lowered defenses.

Name: Primal Aegis
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You surround yourself with a thick field of protective primal energy.

Name: Primal Wellspring
Benefits: Your reservoir of Focus Points is a deep wellspring.

Name: Rejuvenating Touch
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: devotion spell (lay on hands)
Benefits: Your healing energies linger after you cast, providing continual benefits.

Name: Reprepare Spell
Benefits: You’ve discovered how to reuse some of your spell slots over and over.

Name: Retain Absorbed Spell
Benefits: When you absorb a spell using the Absorb Spell reaction, you utilize secret, techniques that allow you to retain the power and knowledge necessary to cast the spell repeatedly—potentially for a greater period of time.

Name: Savage Critical
Benefits: The wounds you inflict are grievous.

Name: School Spell Redirection
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: When you Counterspell a spell with a school matching your specialization, if you critically succeed at your counteract check, or if you succeed while using a spell of a higher level than the spell you countered, you can redirect the spell you countered.

Name: Second Chance Spell
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: When your target proves resilient to your magical deceptions, you can try them again on someone else.

Name: Shadow Hunter
Benefits: You blend in to your surroundings so well that others have trouble telling you apart from the terrain.

Name: Shadow Master
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The shadows protect you better than any armor can, and they give you power to plunge others into darkness.

Name: Shared Clarity
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can project your premonitions of clarity to your allies.

Name: Smash from the Air
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your expertise enables you to knock away spells.

Name: Specialized Companion
Source: Pathfinder #152
Benefits: Your animal companion gains a specialization.

Name: Split Hex
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You siphon some of the power from an offensive hex you cast to direct it at a second target as well.

Name: Stave Off Catastrophe
Benefits: You fully protect your allies from the worst blows.

Name: Swift River
Benefits: You flow like water, avoiding all restraints.

Name: Triangle Shot
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You string three arrows to your bow and fire them all at once.

Name: Trickster's Ace
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have a contingency in your back pocket for desperate situations.

Name: True Transmogrification
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You transmogrify your eidolon each day.

Name: Ultimate Mercy
Benefits: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death.

Name: Versatile Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You can channel the entire realm of possibilities of your spellbook into an attack.

Name: Vicious Evisceration
Benefits: You make a vicious attack that maims your enemy.

Name: Warden's Wellspring
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You command unparalleled focus when you commune with the world around you.

Name: True Perception
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Gain constant effects of true seeing.

Name: Accurate Flurry
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You refine the precision of your unbelievable storm of blows.

Name: All the Time in the World
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: Your firsthand experience of the subjective nature of time and space has given you new observational insights.

Name: Annihilating Swing
Benefits: You have learned from the brute destructive power of xulgaths and their kind.

Name: Apex Companion
Benefits: Gain the apex companion focus spell.

Name: Archwizard's Might
Benefits: You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic.

Name: Astonishing Explosion
Benefits: Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded.

Name: Aura of Unbreakable Virtue
Benefits: Overwhelm evil creatures with your aura.

Name: Avatar's Audience
Benefits: Your extensive service has made you a lesser herald of your deity, which affords you certain privileges.

Name: Banishing Blow
Benefits: The erratic teleportation magic you experienced in the Kortos Mounts has taught you a few tricks.

Name: Bloodline Conduit
Benefits: Your inborn magical nature lets you redirect ambient energies to fuel your spells.

Name: Bloodline Metamorphosis
Benefits: Swap out spells from your repertoire more easily.

Name: Bloodline Mutation
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
Benefits: You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline.

Name: Bloodline Perfection
Benefits: You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition.

Name: Boundless Reprisals
Benefits: With a sixth sense for the flow of combat, you can quickly react to any situation as required.

Name: Celestial Mount
Prerequisites: divine ally (steed); tenets of good
Benefits: Your steed gains incredible celestial powers granted by your deity.

Name: Contagious Rage
Benefits: You can drive your allies into a frenzy, granting them incredible benefits.

Name: Craft Philosopher's Stone
Benefits: Your research has paid off, culminating in the legendary philosopher’s stone.

Name: Cross the Final Horizon
Benefits: You Stride up to your Speed and your ki enshrouds your limbs in a terrifying stormy energy.

Name: Dance of Intercession
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You either performed in or stood witness to the dance used to invoke the Celestial Dragon and can harness a sliver of their power.

Name: Deadly Strikes
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have honed your body to attack with lethal focus.

Name: Demon's Hair
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: Your hair constantly wriggles and writhes.

Name: Denier of Destruction
Benefits: You can manipulate the same energies that the aeon orbs use to sustain life.

Name: Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)
Benefits: Prepare more alchemical items from your infused reagents.

Name: Emblazon Divinity
Benefits: Emblazon more equipment at the same time.

Name: Endurance of the Rooted Tree
Benefits: Just as the Vale of Aroden retains light and life despite inhospitable surroundings, you can sustain yourself regardless of your environment.

Name: Enduring Debilitation
Benefits: Your debilitations last for 1 minute.

Name: Enduring Quickness
Benefits: You move as fast and as high as the wind itself.

Name: Eternal Boost
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your link with your eidolon is so intense that you continuously reinforce its abilities.

Name: Everdistant Defense
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You have learned that distance can foil enemies better than any armor.

Name: Everyone's a Suspect
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are so suspicious of everyone you meet that you keep mental notes on how to defeat them all—even your own allies.

Name: Extradimensional Stash
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear.

Name: Fatal Aria
Benefits: Your songs overwhelm the target with unbearable emotion.

Name: Fiendish Mount
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Prerequisites: divine ally (steed); tenets of evil
Benefits: Your steed ally manifests a suite of powerful and sinister gifts granted to it by your deity.

Name: Fuse Stance
Benefits: You have combined two stances into a single stance all your own.

Name: Golden Body
Benefits: Strike harder and heal more rapidly.

Name: Head of the Night Parade
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display.

Name: Heart of the Kaiju
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: Witnessing the might of a kaiju up close awoke a new ferocity within you.

Name: Hex Master
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

Name: Hidden Paragon
Benefits: When you put your mind to slipping out of sight, you disappear completely.

Name: Hierophant's Power
Benefits: You have entwined yourself with the natural world, and its full power flows through you.

Name: Impossible Snares
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can create endless shorter-lived snares, protecting your lair or using them against foes.

Name: Impossible Striker
Benefits: Your attacks are swift and deadly beyond explanation.

Name: Impossible Technique
Benefits: You execute a maneuver that defies possibility.

Name: Inexhaustible Countermoves
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can react whenever a foe leaves a gap in their defenses.

Name: Just the Facts
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong.

Name: Legendary Rider
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You and your mount move like one being, effortlessly reading each other's signals.

Name: Legendary Shot
Prerequisites: masterful hunter; legendary in Perception; Far Shot
Benefits: You focus on your hunted prey, perceiving angles, air resistance, and every variable that would af ect your ranged attack.

Name: Legendary Summoner
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: Your ability to summon extends past your other spellcasting.

Name: Leyline Conduit
Benefits: You can cast your spells effortlessly by tapping into the leylines of the world.

Name: Maker of Miracles
Benefits: You are a conduit for truly deific power.

Name: Mega Bomb
Benefits: You add an incredibly powerful additive to a held bomb to create a mega bomb.

Name: Metamagic Channel
Benefits: Deep understanding of divine revelations into the nature of vital essence allows you to freely manipulate the effects of your positive or negative energy.

Name: Metamagic Mastery
Benefits: Altering your spells doesn’t take any longer than casting them normally.

Name: Mimic Protections
Benefits: By adopting resonant reflections, you have learned to copy the abilities of other creatures as well.

Name: Mystery Conduit
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The power of your mystery enables you to cast more than just revelation spells.

Name: Oracular Providence
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your mystery grants you access to deep reserves of truly miraculous divine power.

Name: Panache Paragon
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You find opportunities to perform stylish feats in the moments between others' heartbeats and eye blinks.

Name: Paradoxical Mystery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: The truest depths of your divine mystery are fathomless and contradictory, granting you changing powers that even you can barely begin to fathom.

Name: Patron's Truth
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have mastered the greatest secrets of your patron's magic and learned a fundamental truth about your patron, even if their identity still remains a mystery.

Name: Perfect Encore
Benefits: You develop another incredible creation.

Name: Perfect Mutagen
Benefits: You have enhanced the formulas for your mutagens, aligning them perfectly to your physiology.

Name: Pied Piping
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You learn the pied piping composition spell, which enables you to control the actions of weak-minded individuals.

Name: Plum Deluge
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You have learned to saturate an area with poison.

Name: Quaking Stomp
Benefits: You stomp the ground with such force that it creates a minor earthquake.

Name: Radiant Blade Master
Prerequisites: divine ally (blade); Radiant Blade Spirit
Benefits: Your divine ally turns your chosen weapon into a paragon of its type.

Name: Reactive Distraction
Benefits: You reactively switch with your decoy to foil your foe.

Name: Reclaim Spell
Benefits: You have learned to manipulate reflections of magic, similar to the resonant reflections.

Name: Reflecting Riposte
Prerequisites: Dueling Riposte, Mirror Shield, or Twin Riposte
Benefits: You attempt to counteract the triggering spell using powerful magical techniques observed in the Kortos Mounts.

Name: Ringmaster's Introduction
Benefits: You announce the triggering ally with a litany of their legendary achievements, spurring them to action.

Name: Ruby Resurrection
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: In a burst of flame, you return to health like a phoenix rising from the ashes.

Name: Sacred Defender
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You are a great warrior that can stand strong against the fiercest opponents to your cause.

Name: Scapegoat Parallel Self
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You've realized a way to manipulate the effects of your oracular curse.

Name: Sever Space
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You destroy the space between you and your targets, allowing you to strike with your melee weapons at great range.

Name: Shield Paragon
Benefits: Your shield is a vessel of divine protection.

Name: Song of the Fallen
Benefits: Gain the song of the fallen focus spell.

Name: Spell Combination
Benefits: You can merge spells, producing multiple effects with a single casting.

Name: Spell Mastery
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have mastered a handful of spells to such a degree that you can cast them even if you haven't prepared them in advance.

Name: Steal Essence
Prerequisites: legendary in Thievery, master in Arcana, Nature, Occultism, or Religion
Benefits: Being in the presence of the aeon orbs as they deteriorated has taught you how to siphon energy, and you do so with the required magic item.

Name: Superior Sight
Benefits: Increase your visual acuity.

Name: Supreme Spellstrike
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You've made it almost effortless to combine spells and attacks.

Name: Symphony of the Muses
Benefits: You are able to weave countless performances together into a solo symphony.

Name: Synergistic Spell
Prerequisites: Halcyon Spellcasting Initiate; Fulminating Synergy; legendary in Arcana and Nature
Benefits: You combine your synergy and spells into a fantastic web of magic, allowing you to cast two spells at once.

Name: Tenacious Blood Magic
Benefits: You have learned how to invest magic more deeply by witnessing Aroden's works.

Name: Time Dilation Cascade
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You borrow a bit of time from the future to act now.

Name: To the Ends of the Earth
Benefits: Your ability to track your prey has surpassed explanation, allowing you to trace your prey’s movements and predict its location with ease.

Name: Triple Threat
Benefits: You can divide your attention three ways when hunting.

Name: True Shapeshifter
Benefits: You transcend the limitations of form.

Name: Twin Eidolon
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You can transform to match your eidolon.

Name: Ultimate Flexibility
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your experience keeps you on your toes, making you adaptable to even the most dangerous challenges.

Name: Ultimate Polymath
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You can flexibly cast all of your spells, granting a dizzying array of possible options.

Name: Ultimate Skirmisher
Benefits: You are so skilled at navigating the wild, your movement is completely unaffected by terrain.

Name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: You have become a brutal, unstoppable force of nature, able to shrug off mortal wounds with ease.

Name: Verdant Presence
Benefits: The life-giving properties of the aeon orbs flourish within you.

Name: Vitality-Manipulating Stance
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You have learned to attack meridians and pressure points.

Name: Vivacious Afterimage
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You move so quickly that you create a short-lived afterimage, looks exactly like you, in front of you or behind you.

Name: Weapon Supremacy
Benefits: Your skill with weapons lets you attack swiftly at all times.

Name: Whirlwind Spell
Source: Secrets of Magic
Benefits: You combine the might of a multitarget spell with a whirling flurry of attacks.

Name: Whirlwind Toss
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: You whirl a foe to smash into all nearby creatures before throwing them far away.

Name: Wish Alchemy
Benefits: You have learned Artokus Kirran's most hidden secrets, granting you the ability to create alchemy infused with the power of wishes.

Name: Witch's Hut
Source: Advanced Player's Guide
Benefits: Your home is an animated structure that obeys your commands.

Name: Worldsphere Gravity
Source: Pathfinder #168
Benefits: Though creating demiplanes usually requires lengthy rituals, you know how to establish minor planar effects.
